_exec_summary.SummaryText:
OUR COMPANY IS AN AGRICULTURAL RETAIL BUSINESS THAT SPECIALIZES IN PROVIDING THE NECESSARY INPUTS FOR GRAIN, PRODUCE, AND OTHER AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION.  WE ALSO USE ANHYDROUS AMMONIA FOR THE PRODUCTION OF AQUA AMMONIA FOR RETAIL SALE TO MUNICIPALITIES FOR WATER TREATMENT IN OUR EVER EXPANDING URBAN LOCATION.  THIS COMPANY STRIVES TO MAINTAIN A SAFE AND HEALTHY WORK PLACE.

 OUR FARMER OWNERS, MANAGERS AND EMPLOYEES HAVE MADE EVERY EFFORT TO PLAN THE PREVENTION OF ANY ACCIDENTAL RELEASE OF ANHYDROUS AMMONIA.  

OUR PLANT CONSIST OF 2 - 30,000 GAL.  STORAGE TANKS, AND 50-1,000 GAL NURSE TANKS,THESE ALONG WITH THE OCCASSIONAL TEMPORARY USE OF 3 RAIL CARS FOR STORAGE @ 11500 GAL. EACH, AND 1 - 21000 GAL STORAGE TANK FOR AQUEOUA AMMONIA STORAGE;  FILLED TO 85% CAPACITY, WILL HOLD APPROXIMATELY 675,300 POUNDS.   

THE WORST CASE SCENARIO MAY POTENTIALLY RELEASE 131,325 POUNDS (OVER A TEN MINUTE PERIOD) AND HAS A DISTANCE TO ENDPOINT OF 1.10 MILES.  THIS RELEASE HAS THE POTENTIAL TO AFFECT 720 AREA RESIDENTS.  THE ALTERNATIVE RELEASE SCENARIO WOULD HAVE A RELEASE OF 11900 POUNDS OVER A 2?MINUTE RELEASE PERIOD.  THIS RELEASE WOULD HAVE A DISTANCE TO ENDPOINT OF.14 MILES AND WOULD AFFECT 200 PEOPLE WITHIN THE COMMUNITY.

THIS COMPANY MAINTAINS AND OPERATES THEIR NH3 PLANT IN STRICT ACCORDANCE WITH ALL FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL AUTHORITIES.  THE COLORADO  DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE INSPECTS OUR PLANT ON A REGULAR BASIS AND WE COMPLY WITH THEIR REQUEST FOR IMPROVEMENT.  THOSE CHANGES OR IMPROVEMENTS WILL BE ACTED UPON IMMEDIATELY TO REDUCE POTENTIAL AMMONIA RELEASES.  OUR PLANTS, AT THIS TIME,  INCLUDE  EMERGENCY SHUT-OFF CONTROLS.

OUR EMPLOYEES ARE TRAINED IN SAFETY PROCEDURES, PROPER PLANT OPERATION, PLANT MAINTENANCE AND THE EMPLOYEES ARE COMPETENCY TESTED OVER THE TRAINING MATERIAL.  EACH EMPLOYEE USES GOGGLES AND GLOVES DURING AMMONIA OPERATIONS AS WELL AS ALWAYS PROVIDING PLENTY OF SAFETY WATER DURING NURSE TANK LOADING OPERATIONS. 

WITH THE ABOVE MENTIONED TRAINING IN

MIND, IT MAKES IT IS EASY TO REPORT TO YOU THAT ABSOLUTELY NO INJURY ACCIDENTS OR PROPERTY DAMAGE HAVE OCCURRED AT THIS FACILITY FOR THE PAST FIVE YEARS.

OUR EMERGENCY RESPONSE PLAN IS DESIGNED TO MINIMIZE THE RISKS TO EMPLOYEES, THE SURROUNDING PUBLIC AND THE AREA FIRST RESPONDERS.  THIS COMPANY PROVIDES PLANT TOURS FOR OUR LOCAL FIRE DEPARTMENT AND OUR PLAN HAS BEEN SHARED WITH THE COUNTY LOCAL EMERGENCY PLANNING COMMISSION (LEPC).  THEY ARE AWARE OF THE DANGEROUS NATURE OF NH3 AND THEY HAVE AGREED TO ASSIST US IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY.
